p: Danoprevir is an NS3/4A protease inhibitor that is used as an anti-HCV drug. It interferes with virus replication and suppresses the effects of the virus on the host response to viral infection. In a small clinical trial of 11 COVID-19 patients, after 4 to 12Â days of use of Danoprevir, all the patients recovered [94]. So, it might be suggested that Danoprevir could be effective against SARS-CoV-2.
